name: surelog
description: SystemVerilog Pre-processor, parser, elaborator, UHDM compiler

repo.name: Surelog
repo.description: SystemVerilog 2017 Pre-processor, Parser, Elaborator, UHDM Compiler. Provides IEEE Design/TB C/C++ VPI and Python AST & UHDM APIs. Compiles on Linux gcc, Windows msys2-gcc & msvc, OsX

readme.summary: README explains what Surelog is and provides comprehensive command-line reference, but lacks practical quick-start examples and troubleshooting guidance for new users.
readme.top_issue: No quick-start example showing how to actually parse a simple SystemVerilog file - just command-line flags without context

injection_risks.description: The system() function is used with user-controlled input, which can lead to command injection attacks.
The executeCompilation() function uses the system() function with a constructed command string, which may be vulnerable to command injection attacks if not properly sanitized.

critical_findings: Command injection vulnerability in the system() function
Lack of input validation for command-line arguments
security.summary: The code has several security concerns, including a high-risk command injection vulnerability and lack of input validation, which can be exploited by attackers to execute arbitrary commands or access sensitive data.

common_complaints: Build failures in recent versions (v1.85, v1.86)
sentiment.summary: Active project with identified technical issues around recent releases and Python version compatibility, but maintainers are aware and coordinating fixes across package managers.

red_flags: Some responses are brief and lack detail
There is a mix of helpful and unhelpful comments
communication.summary: The maintainer provides some useful information but could be more detailed and consistent in their communication.

concerns: No commits in past 6 months (last commit September 2025)
47 open issues with no recent activity
Zero closed issues in past 6 months
No merged PRs in past 6 months
No active contributors in past 6 months
Unknown last release date suggests no recent release
maintenance.summary: The project shows no signs of active maintenance with complete inactivity over the past 6 months despite a substantial backlog of 47 unresolved issues.

project_metrics.description: SystemVerilog 2017 Pre-processor, Parser, Elaborator, UHDM Compiler. Provides IEEE Design/TB C/C++ VPI and Python AST & UHDM APIs. Compiles on Linux gcc, Windows msys2-gcc & msvc, OsX

analysis_summary.doc_summary: The README provides a good overview of the package's features and installation instructions, but lacks clear troubleshooting guidance and could benefit from more concise examples.
concerns: Low number of merged PRs compared to open issues
Communication: Some responses are brief and lack detail
Communication: There is a mix of helpful and unhelpful comments
